languages.text: {n}Вам кажется, что на строгом лице эльдарки проскальзывает тень улыбки.{/n} "Почти сразу, как принял{mf||а} решение составить мне компанию. Не беспокойся, твое громкое дыхание не потревожило моего погружения".
{n}You think you see the shadow of a smile flit across Yrliet's austere face.{/n} "Almost as soon as you decided to join me. Do not worry, your heavy breathing did not disturb my immersion."
languages.original_text: {n}Вам кажется, что на строгом лице эльдарки проскальзывает тень улыбки.{/n} "Почти сразу, как принял{mf||а} решение составить мне компанию. Не беспокойся, твое громкое дыхание не потревожило моего погружения".

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Crees ver un atisbo de sonrisa que asoma fugazmente al austero rostro de Yrliet.{/n} «Casi tan pronto como decidiste unirte a mí. No te preocupes, tus ronquidos no han perturbado mi inmersión».
languages.original_text: {n}You think you see the shadow of a smile flit across Yrliet's austere face.{/n} "Almost as soon as you decided to join me. Do not worry, your heavy breathing did not disturb my immersion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Crees ver un atisbo de sonrisa que asoma fugazmente al austero rostro de Yrliet.{/n} «Casi tan pronto como decidiste unirte a mí. No te preocupes, tus ronquidos no han perturbado mi inmersión».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットの厳格な顔に微笑のようなものが浮かんだ気がした。{/n}「お前が我の横に座ってすぐだ。大丈夫、お前のうるさい呼吸のせいで覚醒したわけではない」
languages.original_text: {n}You think you see the shadow of a smile flit across Yrliet's austere face.{/n} "Almost as soon as you decided to join me. Do not worry, your heavy breathing did not disturb my immersion."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットの厳格な顔に微笑のようなものが浮かんだ気がした。{/n}「お前が我の横に座ってすぐだ。大丈夫、お前のうるさい呼吸のせいで覚醒したわけではない」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}你觉得伊莉耶特冷峻的脸上似乎掠过了一丝微笑。{/n}“差不多就在你打算加入我的时候。别担心，你沉重的呼吸并没有影响我的沉浸。”
languages.original_text: {n}You think you see the shadow of a smile flit across Yrliet's austere face.{/n} "Almost as soon as you decided to join me. Do not worry, your heavy breathing did not disturb my immersion."

traits.locale_text: {n}你觉得伊莉耶特冷峻的脸上似乎掠过了一丝微笑。{/n}“差不多就在你打算加入我的时候。别担心，你沉重的呼吸并没有影响我的沉浸。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Vous croyez déceler l'ombre d'un sourire traversant le visage austère d'Yrliet.{/n} « Oui, peu de temps après que vous avez décidé de vous joindre à moi. N'ayez nulle inquiétude, votre respiration bruyante n'a pas troublé mon immersion. »
languages.original_text: {n}You think you see the shadow of a smile flit across Yrliet's austere face.{/n} "Almost as soon as you decided to join me. Do not worry, your heavy breathing did not disturb my immersion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous croyez déceler l'ombre d'un sourire traversant le visage austère d'Yrliet.{/n} « Oui, peu de temps après que vous avez décidé de vous joindre à moi. N'ayez nulle inquiétude, votre respiration bruyante n'a pas troublé mon immersion. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Du glaubst, den Anflug eines Lächelns über Yrliets strenges Gesicht huschen zu sehen.{/n} "Sofort, nachdem Ihr entschieden habt, Euch zu mir zu gesellen. Keine Sorge, Euer schwerer Atem hat meine Immersion nicht gestört."
languages.original_text: {n}You think you see the shadow of a smile flit across Yrliet's austere face.{/n} "Almost as soon as you decided to join me. Do not worry, your heavy breathing did not disturb my immersion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du glaubst, den Anflug eines Lächelns über Yrliets strenges Gesicht huschen zu sehen.{/n} "Sofort, nachdem Ihr entschieden habt, Euch zu mir zu gesellen. Keine Sorge, Euer schwerer Atem hat meine Immersion nicht gestört."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}You think you see the shadow of a smile flit across Yrliet's austere face.{/n} "Almost as soon as you decided to join me. Do not worry, your heavy breathing did not disturb my immersion."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in haşin yüzüne minik bir gülümsemenin gölgesi vurmuş gibi hissediyorsun.{/n} "Bana katılmaya karar verdiğin gibi diyebilirim. Endişelenmene gerek yok. Nefes alış verişin, dalgıma engel olmadı."
languages.original_text: {n}You think you see the shadow of a smile flit across Yrliet's austere face.{/n} "Almost as soon as you decided to join me. Do not worry, your heavy breathing did not disturb my immersion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet'in haşin yüzüne minik bir gülümsemenin gölgesi vurmuş gibi hissediyorsun.{/n} "Bana katılmaya karar verdiğin gibi diyebilirim. Endişelenmene gerek yok. Nefes alış verişin, dalgıma engel olmadı."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
